headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DEL CASTILLO JARDINES, LUIS

lead_paragraph: DEL CASTILLO JARDINES--Luis, died Monday, April 28, 2014 at his home in New York City. He is survived by spouse Lourdes; children Miguel, Miguelina, Jose (Jessica), Liz (Randy); siblings Luz, Nena, Julieta, Margot, Lina, Horacio, Else; grandchildren Vic, Julio, Patty, Michelle, Julissa, Melissa, Marilu, Raquel, Erik, Mikey, Jagger. Family to receive friends and relatives atFrank E. Campbell Funeral Home, 1076 Madison Ave, New York, NY on Thursday, May 1, 2014, 4pm-8pm. Funeral Mass: Friday, May 2, 10am, Our Lady of Peace Church, 237 E. 62nd St., New York.
